Changes in version 7.0.9:
* Bug fixes and improvements.

* You can now search for works submitted during a specific date range.
* You can now search for works by their "Like!" count (Premium feature).
* These can be set using the upper right options button when viewing search results.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* You can now search for works submitted during a specific date range.
* You can now search for works by their "Like!" count (Premium feature).
* These can be set using the upper right options button when viewing search results.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Increased the maximum number of mutes from 100 to 200. (Premium feature)
* You can now reply directly to comments.
* You can now delete your submitted comments, as well as comments on works you submitted.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Increased the maximum number of mutes from 100 to 200. (Premium feature)
* You can now reply directly to comments.
* You can now delete your submitted comments, as well as comments on works you submitted.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Comments and subtitles belonging to the streamers in live viewings are now easier to tell apart from other comments.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Comments and subtitles belonging to the streamers in live viewings are now easier to tell apart from other comments.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Works can now be zoomed directly from the work details screen when you want to view them in a larger size.
* They can be resized to your liking by performing a pinch gesture on illustrations, manga or Ugoira.
* Bug fixes and improvements.

* Works can now be zoomed directly from the work details screen when you want to view them in a larger size.
* They can be resized to your liking by performing a pinch gesture on illustrations, manga or Ugoira.
* Bug fixes and improvements.

* The Live viewer has been redesigned.
- Viewer window size has been increased in portrait mode.
- Lives can now be zoomed using the pinch gesture.

* Added a new feature: Shoutout.
- Viewers can now show their support to streamers with this new feature.
- Using Shoutout requires points, which can be purchased for a fixed fee.
- Can only be sent to streamers that have enabled the feature.

* Other bug fixes and improvements.

- Lives can now be zoomed using the pinch gesture.

* Added a new feature: Shoutout.

- Using Shoutout requires points, which can be purchased for a fixed fee.
- Can only be sent to streamers that have enabled the feature.

* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Bug fixes and improvements.

* This release contains several bug fixes.

- Announcing the end of support for iOS 9

As of November 2018, iOS 9 will no longer be supported by this app. Versions 7.3.0 onwards will be unable to be used by devices running iOS 9. To receive future updates of this app, please consider updating your version of iOS. If your device does not support iOS 10, please consider using the mobile version of our website.

* This release contains several bug fixes.

- Announcing the end of support for iOS 9

As of November 2018, iOS 9 will no longer be supported by this app. Versions 7.3.0 onwards will be unable to be used by devices running iOS 9. To receive future updates of this app, please consider updating your version of iOS. If your device does not support iOS 10, please consider using the mobile version of our website.

* This release includes Live screen performance improvements when there are multiple streamers and other bug fixes.

* Works can now be submitted directly from the My Page tab, instead of from the Submitted Works screen.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Works can now be submitted directly from the My Page tab, instead of from the Submitted Works screen.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Tags shown within the app have been converted to hashtag format, and now begin with '#'.
- As a result, tags beginning with '#' can no longer be set when submitting works.
* It's now easier to find relevant works when tapping a tag.
- Tapping a tag now results in a search by exact match, instead of by partial match.
* The option to search novel tags by exact match has also been added.

* Tags shown within the app have been converted to hashtag format, and now begin with '#'.
- As a result, tags beginning with '#' can no longer be set when submitting works.
* It's now easier to find relevant works when tapping a tag.
- Tapping a tag now results in a search by exact match, instead of by partial match.
* The option to search novel tags by exact match has also been added.

* Translations are now displayed for some tags and search suggestions when using a language setting other than Japanese.
- Translations will only be shown next to Japanese tags and keywords if they have a translation set for them.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Translations are now displayed for some tags and search suggestions when using a language setting other than Japanese.
- Translations will only be shown next to Japanese tags and keywords if they have a translation set for them.
* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Other bug fixes and improvements.

* Novels can now be submitted through the app.
* The new novel submission screen can be accessed via the Submit Work button in My Page.
* It is not yet possible to edit submitted works from within the app. The ability to edit submissions is planned for a future release. Until then, please consider editing works from the mobile browser version of pixiv.

* Novels that are a work in progress can now be saved as a draft.
* Drafts can be created and updated by tapping the Save in Drafts button at the bottom of the novel submission screen.
* Saved drafts can be edited from the Novels tab of Submitted Works.

* The Submitted Works screen, accessible from My Page, has been renamed to Manage Works.

* Novels can now be submitted through the app.
* The new novel submission screen can be accessed via the Submit Work button in My Page.
* It is not yet possible to edit submitted works from within the app. The ability to edit submissions is planned for a future release. Until then, please consider editing works from the mobile browser version of pixiv.

* Novels that are a work in progress can now be saved as a draft.
* Drafts can be created and updated by tapping the Save in Drafts button at the bottom of the novel submission screen.
* Saved drafts can be edited from the Novels tab of Submitted Works.

* The Submitted Works screen, accessible from My Page, has been renamed to Manage Works.

* Fixed a problem for iOS 13.1 users where URLs were a little too responsive to taps.
* Bug fixes and improvements.

* Fixed a problem for iOS 13.1 users where URLs were a little too responsive to taps.
* Bug fixes and improvements.

・Several improvements and bug fixes.

・Support for iOS versions prior to 11 will be discontinued soon.
　　・ If you are currently using iOS versions prior to 11, please upgrade the iOS version of your smartphone.
　　・ If your device does not support iOS 11 and later, please use pixiv on your smartphone browser instead.
